member.summary: Defines ranges to be used with controls.
member.remarks: Range objects have min and max properties that define the range's domain, as well as color and thickness properties that define the range's appearance. Every Gauge control has at least two ranges: the defines the minimum and maximum values for the gauge, and the displays the gauge's current value.
